Name: Final Islands
About the game: Final Islands is a Top-down view Action Roguelike. 2 most important thing are Action and Build. -- Action With unique physic system you need to 'manually' control your character, an action Diablo like game. -- Build More than 150 attributes, items, skills, runes and classes. Combine these together to build your own style. -- Challenge Not only prepare before the game start but also you need to collect things during the game, get used to your character, make decision in a very short time while surrounding by numerous monsters.
Meta Title: Final Islands: Apr 26, 2019, Mor North 3 and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Final Islands? Check out the release date (Apr 26, 2019), developer insights from Mor North 3, and a complete game summary.
